titleStmt.title: A prediction of Mr. Edvvards his conversion and recantation. By William Walvvin.
titleStmt.author: Walwyn, William, 1600-1681.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T[homas] P[aine] for G. Whittington and N. Brookes, at the signe of the Angell in Cornhill, below the Exchange,
